author: Jack Paul

text: PSP has stereo speakers and game OSTs are recorded in that style. The only downside to PSP speakers is lack of natural high volume. Something which can be a problem even for high powered laptops today. But if it had an official OST release, it wouldn't have those shortcomings since again, recorded in stereo. Not to mention, this is a remake of the PS1 version.
